name: UIView.AnimationOptions
desc: Options for animating views using block objects.

items.name: static var layoutSubviews: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Lay out subviews at commit time so that they are animated along with their parent.

items.name: static var allowUserInteraction: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Allow the user to interact with views while they are being animated.

items.name: static var beginFromCurrentState: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Start the animation from the current setting associated with an already in-flight animation.

items.name: static var `repeat`: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Repeat the animation indefinitely.

items.name: static var autoreverse: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Run the animation backwards and forwards (must be combined with the repeat option).

items.name: static var overrideInheritedDuration: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Force the animation to use the original duration value specified when the animation was submitted.

items.name: static var overrideInheritedCurve: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Force the animation to use the original curve value specified when the animation was submitted.

items.name: static var allowAnimatedContent: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Animate the views by changing the property values dynamically and redrawing the view.

items.name: static var showHideTransitionViews: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Hide or show views during a view transition.

items.name: static var overrideInheritedOptions: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: The option to not inherit the animation type or any options.

items.name: static var curveEaseInOut: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: Specify an ease-in ease-out curve, which causes the animation to begin slowly, accelerate through the middle of its duration, and then slow again before completing.

items.name: static var curveEaseIn: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: An ease-in curve causes the animation to begin slowly, and then speed up as it progresses.

items.name: static var curveEaseOut: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: An ease-out curve causes the animation to begin quickly, and then slow as it completes.

items.name: static var curveLinear: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A linear animation curve causes an animation to occur evenly over its duration.

items.name: static var transitionFlipFromLeft: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that flips a view around its vertical axis from left to right (the left side of the view moves toward the front and right side toward the back).

items.name: static var transitionFlipFromRight: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that flips a view around its vertical axis from right to left (the right side of the view moves toward the front and left side toward the back).

items.name: static var transitionCurlUp: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that curls a view up from the bottom.

items.name: static var transitionCurlDown: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that curls a view down from the top.

items.name: static var transitionCrossDissolve: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that dissolves from one view to the next.

items.name: static var transitionFlipFromTop: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that flips a view around its horizontal axis from top to bottom (the top side of the view moves toward the front and the bottom side toward the back).

items.name: static var transitionFlipFromBottom: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A transition that flips a view around its horizontal axis from bottom to top (the bottom side of the view moves toward the front and the top side toward the back).

items.name: static var preferredFramesPerSecond30: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A frame rate of 30 frames per second.

items.name: static var preferredFramesPerSecond60: UIView.AnimationOptions
items.desc: A frame rate of 60 frames per second.
